instructions: From the Home screen, swipe up then tap Gmail . Tap the compose icon at the bottom-right side of the screen. Enter the recipient in the To: field. Enter a subject title. Compose your email, then tap the paperclip icon . Tap Attach file . Select the file, then tap Send .

From the Home screen, swipe up then tap Gmail . Tap the compose icon at the bottom-right side of the screen. Enter the recipient in the To: field. Enter a subject title. Compose your email, then tap the Send .
